name: Moribund (itch) (phil.ao)
description:
This is the first game I've ever created. I'm open for ctiticism, so please let me know if there is a bug or if you have some Ideas for the game that I should implement (please have in mind that I'm still a beginner). 

Thanks to everyone who is interested in the game and clicked on the page. This game is free to play, so everyone who thought of donating (so probably no one) really don't have to, there are a way more things that you could donate a dollar on. Thanks again and have fun!

[ Story ]

You're a dark magician who was banned from the kingdom because of the usage of forbidden magic. 

Now you're being hunted down by the court and because of the power you gained during these years, they want to see you dead. 

So be ready to defend yourself!
